name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Blue Moon
description: Lan and his computer counterpart Mega Man.EXE face double trouble from an asteroid hurtling towards Earth, and a mysterious NetNavi threatening the network. Meanwhile the pair must prove their skills in a new NetBattle tournament. Part role-playing game, part battle simulation, Mega Manâ„¢ Battle Network 4 comes in two versions: Blue Moon and Red Sun. Each include separate storylines, enemies, Battle Chips and upgrades to discover. Collect Battle Chips to select your strategies, and activate the new Soul Unison system to gain special abilities.
